server for recipe site.

## Table of contents

- [Technologies](#technologies)

## Technologies

Project is created with:

- Sails.js
- MangoDB

## Setup

To run this project, install it locally using npm:

```
$ cd ../recipe-server
$ npm install
$ sails lift
```

port listening at http://localhost:1337 !
